document_data.name: Calhyar
document_data.mainbody: '''Calhyar''', or '''Calhyar of the Winds''', was the third senior [[Witches of Rashemen]] in [[Mulsantir]] and a senior member of the [[Moonstars]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Khelben himself did not understand the motivations of Calhyar but preferred to have her close in order to unveil her secret.
document_data.History: Calhyar was the first to offer her services to [[Khelben Arunsun]], saying to had have a premonition about four years before. Khelben accepted her only because he himself knew little about [[Rashemen]] and hoped to collect more information from Calhyar.
